name: Corsairs Gold
description: Somewhat functional Installer for a very buggy game.For known bugs see: https://www.gog.com/forum/corsairs_gold/offline_installer_for_lutris

files.installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Corsairs Gold/corsairs.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui /suppressmsgboxes
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
